title: Spring Game Showcase 2025 - 60 Indie Games - Kinda Funny x The MIX
description:
Kinda Funny and the MIX have teamed up once again to bring you a jam-packed showcase of brand new video games!

The Kinda Funny Membership gets you Ad-Free and Exclusive Shows: https://www.youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames/join
http://www.patreon.com/KindaFunny 

Subscribe And Ring The Notification Bell: 
Kinda Funny Games: http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Follow Us:
Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids 
Bluesky: https://bsky.app/profile/kindafunnyvids.bsky.social
Instagram: http://instagram.com/KindaFunnyVids
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@kindafunnygames
Twitch: http://www.twitch.tv/KindaFunnyGames

Merch: http://www.kindafunny.com/store 

Listen To Our Podcasts on Your Favorite Podcast Service:
Kinda Funny Games Daily: https://bit.ly/2T3Y3rS
Kinda Funny Gamescast: https://bit.ly/3wBgRwg
The Kinda Funny Podcast: https://bit.ly/3wA9GVo
In Review – Movies Ranked, Reviewed, & Recapped: https://bit.ly/2VAgdT7

Follow The Kinda Funny Team:
Greg Miller: https://twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Tim Gettys: https://twitter.com/TimGettys
Nick Scarpino: https://twitter.com/Nick_Scarpino
Andy Cortez: https://twitter.com/TheAndyCortez
Blessing Adeoye: https://twitter.com/BlessingJr
Mike Howard: https://twitter.com/SnowBikeMike
Kevin Coello: https://twitter.com/KindaFunnyKevin
Joey Noelle: https://twitter.com/joeynoelle
Barrett Courtney: https://twitter.com/SadBoyBarrett
Roger Pokorny: https://twitter.com/rogformer

be to build prototypes craft vertical slices and Pitch your vision when the odds feel stacked against you and the way that this year has gone I can understand if those odds feel pretty high that's why this fund exists to give talented creators the resources support and opportunities they need to bring their bold never-before-seen ideas to life so whether you're a solo Dev surviving among vampires or a small team grinding to a funky new beat this is for you we're talking funding to get your project off the ground mentorship to guide you through the challenges and and that's all thanks to a network of people who genuinely want to see you succeed it's about building community that believes in new potential and we can't wait to see what incredible ideas you're going to create so if you're ready to take the next step head over to experien studios. or/ xpen fun for all the details on how to apply get ready to give the world a new experience there's so much bad news in our industry that I
